Headline: #156 LaSalle Temporary Southbound Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: SB 156 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound 1#56 LaSalle buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan: due to, street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute near Belmont/Hudson
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont rrtd EB via Blmnt, Hlstd, Addison, In. Lk Shore Dr & Sheridan: WB via Blmnt, In. Lk Shore Dr, Addison, Hlstd & Blmnt due to blockage nr Blmnt/Hudson

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Belmont/Hudson.

  • Eastbound buses will operate via Belmont, Halsted, Addison, Inner Lake Shore Drive and Sheridan
  • Westbound buses will operate via Belmont, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Addison, Halsted and Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at Cermak
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Cermak due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Cermak due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
